sentences.en: Abstention is traditionally high in Colombia.
sentences.cn: 在哥伦比亚，弃权率历来较高。

sentences.en: As we have seen, those changes tend to span disciplines that are not traditionally thought of as part of the mandate of Release Engineering.
sentences.cn: 正如我们所看到的那样，那些变更是跨学科的，并且在传统上并不属于版本工程学要求的一部分。

sentences.en: Degree courses have traditionally focused on the established great writers of the past.
sentences.cn: 学位课程的内容一直以来都集中于过去的知名作家.

sentences.en: Fierce rivalries have traditionally fragmented the region.
sentences.cn: 激烈的竞争已经如从前一样使得该地区四分五裂。

sentences.en: Foxes were traditionally regarded as vermin.
sentences.cn: 人们传统上都认为狐狸是有害的动物.

sentences.en: German beer has traditionally been made from just four ingredients — hops, malt, yeast and water.
sentences.cn: 德国啤酒传统上只用4种原料——啤酒花、麦芽、酵母和水。

sentences.en: He is loathed by some of the more traditionally minded officers.
sentences.cn: 他为某些思想较守旧的官员所憎恶。

sentences.en: Hell is traditionally associated with suffering.
sentences.cn: 地狱历来与受苦联系在一起。

sentences.en: In the UK visible imports have traditionally been greater than visible exports.
sentences.cn: 在英国，传统上有形产品的进口一直大于出口。

sentences.en: Men traditionally monopolized jobs in the printing industry.
sentences.cn: 在传统上，男人包揽了印刷行业中的所有工作。

sentences.en: The fast is broken at sunset, traditionally with dates and water.
sentences.cn: 日落时开斋，按传统会吃椰枣、喝水。

sentences.en: The marketplace was where commerce was traditionally carried on.
sentences.cn: 这个集市是传统的贸易场所.

sentences.en: To be successful selling to them, you have to cater to their emotions and concerns more than ever before, even when selling products that men traditionally buy.
sentences.cn: 为了成功的向她们推销，你必须比以往更加迎合这部分人群的情感和关切，甚至传统上由男人来购买的产品也是一样。

sentences.en: Traditionally men have compartmentalized their lives, never letting their personal lives encroach upon their professional lives.
sentences.cn: 传统上男人把自己的生活划分清楚，他们不会让私生活影响其工作。

sentences.en: Traditionally piglets were weaned at eight weeks.
sentences.cn: 小猪通常在八周时断奶.

sentences.en: Traditionally young Asians in Britain have gravitated towards medicine, law and engineering.
sentences.cn: 英国的亚裔年轻人通常被吸引到医学、法律及工程专业。

sentences.en: Traditionally, the bride pays for her bridesmaids'dresses.
sentences.cn: 传统上伴娘的服装费由新娘支付.

sentences.en: Women have had to prove themselves in every field that they have traditionally be barred from.
sentences.cn: 女性必须在那些传统上被禁止的每一个领域中证明自己。

words.tran_cn: 传统派的；传统主义者的
传统主义者；因循守旧者
